original: Rūpaṁ rūpāyatanaṁ rūpadhātu nīlaṁ pītakaṁ lohitakaṁ odātaṁ cakkhuviññeyyaṁ cakkhusmiṁ paṭihaññati cakkhussa āpāthaṁ āgacchatīti?
analyzed: ▁rūpaṃ ▁rūpāyatanaṃ ▁rūp adhātu ▁nīl aṃ ▁ pīt akaṃ ▁lohita kaṃ ▁odāt aṃ ▁cakkhu viññeyy aṃ ▁cakkhu smiṃ ▁paṭi haññ ati ▁cakkhu ssa ▁āpāth aṃ ▁āgaccha tīti

original: Hañci “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇan”ti—
attheva suttanto, no ca vata re vattabbe—
Nanu passati abhikkamantaṁ paṭikkamantaṁ ālokentaṁ vilokentaṁ samiñjentaṁ pasārentanti?
analyzed: ▁nanu ▁passati ▁abhi kkam antaṃ ▁paṭi kkam antaṃ ▁ālok e nt aṃ ▁vi lok e nt aṃ ▁sam iñj e nt aṃ ▁pa sār e nt anti

original: Hañci passati abhikkamantaṁ paṭikkamantaṁ ālokentaṁ vilokentaṁ samiñjentaṁ pasārentaṁ, tena vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: ▁hañci ▁passati ▁abhi kkam antaṃ ▁paṭi kkam antaṃ ▁ālok e nt aṃ ▁vi lok e nt aṃ ▁sam iñj e nt aṃ ▁pa sār e nt aṃ ▁tena ▁vata ▁ re ▁vattabbe

original: Niyamo asaṅkhato, paṭiccasamuppādo asaṅkhato, cattāri saccāni asaṅkhatāni, cattāro
analyzed: ▁niyam o ▁asaṃkhat o ▁paṭiccasamuppād o ▁asaṃkhat o ▁cattāri ▁sacc āni ▁asaṃkhat āni ▁cattāro

original: āruppā asaṅkhatā, nirodhasamāpatti asaṅkhatā, ākāso asaṅkhato, ākāso sanidassano,
analyzed: ▁ ā rupp ā ▁asaṃkhat ā ▁nirodh asamāpatti ▁asaṃkhat ā ▁ākās o ▁asaṃkhat o ▁ākās o ▁sa nidassan o
